A very perfect breakfast energizer: noodles slightly wet in a broth, topped with chopped green mango/papaya and then with a very soft yellow curry fish sauce, all that coupled with a proper gastronomical herbarium, incl. mint leaf - that's exactly a kick that you need in the morning! Absolutely delicious. It reminded me Thai Southern breakfast dish Khanom Jin from Phuket or Num Bon Jok Kampot from Cambodia just other side of the border of HaTien. Highly recommended! Closes at 10AM, don't be late. Hosts are very friendly and caring. 25K  ice green tea Xem thÃªm

I went here yesterday night. Not very crowded and had many seats open. Good seating area when raining. I wish there was more fans. I ordered mi cay bo with spicy leve one. It was too spicy that I could only eat less than half. It was good. Maybe next time i will come back and order level once spicy. They have friendly staff that refills water when needed. Bathroom was okay clean. The beef was pretty big and chewy and i didnt like that. The meatball was good. The broth was a little sour for my liking. Good food.
I would never come back to this place. The food took too long. The food came 20 to 30 minutes later. The fried rice was the worst Iâ€™ve ever tried. Other dishes was not good. The chicken was very chewy. The place is also expensive. The fried rice had no flavor, I had to use lots of soy sauce. The hot pot didnt have a lot of meat in it either.

Took a risk going to a place with no reviews, but if you're on here, you know most places are closed down anyways.   More expensive compared to elsewhere, but out of 4 places, the only one I could find available, and definitely worth it.   It was an amazing buffet of maybe 10 trays of meat and a couple baskets of vegetables. Clean place, chill atmosphere, staff wasn't the most attentive, but did replace the grill a few times with a clean one. No English.

Great place with a great tasting shakes, coffees and smoothies.   It is located near a main road in a little sideallay. The atmousphare in the dong nat cafe is relaxed and laid back.  It is one of the cafes that didnt blast loud music all the time,so it is easy possible to have a conversation  The prices for coffee and shakes ranges somewhere between 20-40k so it is not to expensive.  Also if you a smoker like me, you could order a shisha here and have a smoke.  I only can recommend the place,if you come through son la make a stop here :)

Nhan banh hoi nhuyen. Nuoc sup vua an. Ban nao dan mien Nam ra muon cham nuoc mam thi cung co chai nuoc mam chua ngot tren ban, them chut nuoc mam man nua la cham banh cuon ngon.
